text: Tobias Linderoth (born 21 April 1979) is a former Swedish football player and current manager. He has played for Sweden national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League CupIncludes English League Cup (1 in 2002–03 and 2 in 2003–04) Europe Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals IFK Hässleholm 1995 Division 1 Södra 7 0 – 7 0 Elfsborg 1996 Division 1 Södra 10 0 – 10 0 1997 Allsvenskan 25 1 – 25 1 1998 Allsvenskan 22 3 – 22 3 Total 57 4 0 0 — 57 4 Stabæk 1999 Tippeligaen 23 3 3 0 2 0 28 3 2000 Tippeligaen 24 4 0 0 3 1 27 5 2001 Tippeligaen 21 2 3 0 – 24 2 Total 68 9 6 0 5 1 79 10 Everton 2001–02 Premier League 8 0 3 0 – 11 0 2002–03 Premier League 5 0 1 0 – 6 0 2003–04 Premier League 27 0 2 1 – 29 1 Total 40 0 6 1 — 46 1 Copenhagen 2004–05 Danish Superliga 29 0 4 0 0 0 33 0 2005–06 Danish Superliga 29 1 2 0 4 0 35 1 2006–07 Danish Superliga 24 3 3 0 10 1 37 4 Total 82 4 9 0 14 1 105 5 Galatasaray 2007–08 Süper Lig 7 0 0 0 5 1 12 1 2008–09 Süper Lig 2 0 0 0 1 0 3 0 2009–10 Süper Lig 4 0 3 0 3 0 10 0 Total 13 0 3 0 9 1 25 1 Career total 267 17 24 1 28 3 319 21 *Also played 22 (2004–05, 2005–06, 2006–07) Royal League matches where he scored 1 goal. *Also played 3 (2005, 2006) Tele2 LigaCup matches (unofficial). ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Sweden 1999 1 0 2000 2 0 2001 13 1 2002 12 0 2003 3 0 2004 14 0 2005 10 0 2006 11 0 2007 7 0 2008 3 1 Total 76 2 :Scores and results list Sweden's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Linderoth goal.
